## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Laverne S. Crofoot v. Harrison Bloomer, and Third-Party Frederick Oakleaf, Third-Party Defendant-Respondent
**판결일**: 1960-05-12
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 11 A.D.2d 632

## 판결문 요약


Order unanimously affirmed, without costs of this appeal to any party. (Appeal from order of Monroe Special Term [entered in Wayne County] dismissing the third-party complaint.) Present — Bastow, J. P., Goldman, Halpern, MeClusky and Henry, JJ.
